seniority_level.evidence: Title includes 'Data Engineer' with 5-8+ years of experience requirement

job_family.evidence: Title specifies 'Data Engineer-Data Platforms' and responsibilities focus on building data platforms using AWS and Hadoop

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both streaming (Kafka) and batch (Spark, Hive) processing paradigms, as well as data warehouse (AWS RedShift) and lake (Hadoop, S3 patterns) storage layers

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include developing efficient software code for multiple use cases and implementing scalable solutions, suggesting technical leadership without direct people management

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS mentioned explicitly in title and multiple times in responsibilities (AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS RedShift)

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond AWS

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both streaming pipelines (Kafka) and batch processing (Spark, Hive, scheduled jobs implied by data volumes)

orchestrator_category.evidence: No explicit mention of orchestration tools like Airflow, Luigi, or cloud-native orchestrators

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions AWS RedShift (warehouse) and Hadoop/S3 patterns (lake), with no lakehouse-specific tools (Delta Lake, Iceberg, Hudi) explicitly stated

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' suggests regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location is explicitly 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' with no mention of timezone flexibility

relocation_required.evidence: No mention of relocation assistance or requirement, location is specified as Pune

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, location is India which does not require H1B for residents

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No signals related to OPT/CPT or student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: No discussion of citizenship or work authorization requirements in the job posting

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as 'full_time' with no contract type mentioned, typical for W2 in India

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit or implied career growth paths discussed in the job posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs or working with senior engineers in a mentorship context

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No discussion of career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect)

requirement_strictness.evidence: All listed skills are under 'must have' with no 'nice to have' skills mentioned, strict qualifiers like 'minimum 5+ years'

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities focusing on data engineering and data platforms, single role description

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Years of experience (5-8+) align with senior-level expectations for data engineering roles
